*New in 2.1:*

 * `-(void)_windowWillRotate;`
 * `-(void)_windowDidRotate;`
 * `@property UIView<UIFormPeripheral>* _nextPeripheral;`
 * `@property UIView<UIFormPeripheral>* _peripheral;`
 * `@property id<UIFormControl> _controlToFocusAfterRotation;`
 * `@property id<UIFormControl> _nextControl;`
 * `@property id<UIFormControl> _control;`

*Changed in 2.1:*
|| *Old* || *New* ||

=== UIAutocorrectInlinePrompt ===
Note that the ivar layout is changed by removing an `int m_position` ivar in 2.1.

*New in 2.1:*
 `-(BOOL)isAcceptableTextEffectsFrame:(CGRect)frame;`
 `-(float)maximumCandidateWidth;`
 `-(CGRect)horizontallySquishedCorrectionFrame:(CGRect)frame;`
 `-(CGRect)correctionFrameFromDesiredFrame:(CGRect)frame textHeight:(int)height;`

*Removed in 2.1:*
 * `@property int position;`
 * `-(CGRect)topRect;`
 * `-(CGRect)bottomRect;`

=== UIInlineCandidateTextView ===
The whole class is removed in 2.1.

=== !InlineCandidateCell ===
The whole class is removed in 2.1.

=== UIAccentedCharacterView ===
The ivar layout is completely modified. Do not rely on the ivar layout at all. Use class_getInstanceVariable() or other runtime functions instead.

*New in 2.1:*
